creator: pedro_cristian@yahoo.fr
text:
Using ChainSaw 2.0Alpha
The WebStart version is 1.2.0_03 
The underlying jdk JDK 1.4.1_03

when creating a new SocketReceiver with no name, it is not possible to select it
afterward and make any change.

Fixed in svn 824592 
 - Changed Chainsaw UI logic so name is required on receiver creation/modification
creator: sdeboy@iname.com
